posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: March 21, 2015 at 10:14 PM#3unfortunately it is not possible to have quotes inside quotes....you may workaround this by using carefully chosen macronames, as the quotes are only necessary if the text starts with a number, contain spaces, or can be confused with a keyword or the abbrevation of a keyword.e.g."My_nice_macro"assign executor 1 cue 1/cmd="macro My_nice_macro""Fun Facts"assign executor 1 cue 1/cmd="macro fun*facts"(be aware that replacing the space with wildcard would also call e.g. macro "funny artifacts")
